description: Try our easy to follow Vintage Cheese & Herb Soufflés recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cheese souffle,Pescatarian,Halal,High protein,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Vintage Cheese & Herb Soufflés Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C. Brush 4 x 1-cup soufflé dishes with melted butter and coat with breadcrumbs.

Melt extra butter in a small saucepan. Add flour and whisk until well combined and bubbly. Remove saucepan from heat and slowly add milk, whisking constantly. Return to heat and whisk until a smooth thick sauce forms and comes to the boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 1 minute. Remove from heat.
Add cheese, herbs and egg yolks, stirring until cheese has melted.

Using electric beaters, beat egg whites and a pinch of salt in a clean bowl until stiff peaks form. Using a large metal spoon (see tip), fold 1/3 of egg white mixture into cheese sauce. Add remaining egg white and fold through mixture. Spoon into prepared dishes. Bake for 20 minutes or until golden and risen. Serve immediately.
